select1.label: Position patient in Fowler or semi Fowler position unless otherwise ordered , to allow appropriate lung expansion
Fill humidifier container to designated level
Attach flow meter to humidifier and insert proper oxygen therapy

Administer oxygen therapy Via nasal catheter
-Attach nasal catheter to oxygen tubing , then attach tubing to flow meter -Place catheter in cup of water and turn on flow meter to 6 10 L flush tubing -Adjust flow Rate to prescribed amount , usually 2 L/mt -Determine depth of insertion by using nasal catheter to measure from patients ear lobe to tip of nose Cover tip of catheter with water soluble lubricant -Hold catheter to observe its natural curvature and gently insert catheter into one side of nasal passage Inspect ,mouth -With draw catheter approx. 1 cm or until its visible -Tape catheter in place, it may be taped to bridge of nose or side of cheek -Provide slack of tubing and secure patient garment
Via nasal cannula/ prongs -Attach nasal cannula to oxygen tubing , then attach tubing to flow meter -Place prongs in cup of water adjust flow meter to 6 10 L flush tubing and prongs with oxygen -Adjust flow arte to prescribed amount , place nasal prongs into each nares of patient -Adjust straps of cannula over ears ,tighten under chin -Place padding between strap and ears
Via Face MASK -Adjust flow Rate to prescribed amount , usually 6-10 L/mt -Place mask over bridge of nose and then cover mouth -Adjust straps around patient head and over ears -Remove mask and clean skin and dry 1-2 hrs
Via oxygen tent -Place oxygen machine at head of bed -Fanfold top sheet to patients waist -Set temperature to 70 degrees -Turn machine one , Adjust flow Rate to prescribed amount , usually 10-12 L/mt
Placement of Canopy -Lift canopy over patient and tuck back canopy under head of mattress -Tuck sides of canopy under sides of mattress at head of bed -Place folded barn blanket lengthwise across patients thighs -Place lower , front edges
Position patient in Fowler or semi Fowler position unless otherwise ordered , to allow appropriate lung expansion
